articles.title: Amazon revives its Echo Spot with an upgraded look and improved audio - TechCrunch
articles.description: Amazon has released an all-new version of its Echo Spot ahead of Prime Day, the company announced on Monday.
articles.content: Amazon has released an all-new version of its Echo Spot ahead of Prime Day, the company announced on Monday. The 2024 version of the Alexa-enabled smart alarm clock costs $79.99, but is currently on … [+1607 chars]
